Name: The Clock that Decides the Future
AttributesDescription:
Dealing Tune Rupture DMG to the target increases the ATK and Crit. DMG of all Resonators in the team by 30% for 15s.
All Resonators in the team have their Tune Break Efficiency increased by 100%.
Dealing Tune Break DMG increases All-Attribute DMG by 50% for 30s.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: Like clocks and falling sand, it foretells the doom already ordained. Yet even as that fate draws near, it extends a gentle reprieveâ€”an opportunity not to change the destined finale, but to show the stubborn dignity that defines humanity.
